name: Shroom Switcher
description:
Shroom Switcher is a short 2D precision platformer. Reach the end of all the levels but beware that elements in the level switch on every jump!

Features:

  • 16 Levels ranging from easy to expert.
  • Interplay of 4 unique features to master.
  • Stats for speedrunning & deathcount.

Controls:

Keyboard: 
Moving: A & D Jump and switch state: Space Dash: Shift Bounce Slash: Arrow Keys

Controller: 
Moving: Left Stick Jump and switch state: A  Dash: Right Trigger Button Bounce Slash: Right Stick

Created by Team Trash Pandas.

Jip
Jeroen
Hugo
Jordi

First-year student project. 
International Game Architecture and Design at Breda University of Applied Sciences.
